message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and what it can bring to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $95 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend right now.  Would you be willing to do $80?  That's my absolute max for this product.

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value and quality of our product, I'm not able to lower the price below $90. This is still within a reasonable range compared to other market prices for similar products. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $90 is still a bit high for me.  Let's split the difference at $85.  I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.
